name: Escape the Glitch
storyline:
The glitcher, a mysterious entity, relentlessly roams the forest, determined to impede your progress. Navigate a tense game of cat and mouse, using your wits to outsmart this formidable foe. Beware of direct eye contact, as it freezes the glitcher for a maximum of 10 seconds or until you avert your gaze. Seize this fleeting opportunity to make a quick escape and continue your quest.

The glitcher is no ordinary adversary, only able to move when out of sight or after the 10-second freeze. Stay alert, trust your instincts, and outmaneuver the glitcher's relentless pursuit. A distinctive flute sound signals when the glitcher stops pursuing, offering a momentary reprieve and a chance to catch your breath.

Immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of the foggy forest, where every step is fraught with danger, and every encounter with the glitcher heightens the suspense. Can you navigate the treacherous terrain, collect all five bottles, and emerge victorious in this heart-pounding game of strategy and survival?
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure within a haunting, fog-laden forest in our latest game. Your mission: collect five scattered bottles hidden in houses across the map, all while avoiding the ominous presence of the glitcher.
